content.rendered:
Directed by Sian Davies. Matthew Saville.

Written by Lucas Taylor. Lucas Taylor. Beatrix Christian. Boyd Quakawoot.

Cast Jemmason Power (Hazel Baker). Talijah Blackman-Corowa (Isabel Baker). Eden Cassady (Kalana Baker). Seini Willett (Glenda Baker). Gulliver McGrath (Constable Dale Quinn). Annabel Wolfe (Young Chloe Walcott). Jimi Bani (Joe Baker). Fraser Anderson (Young Hector Ford). Josh Macqueen (Young Anton Bianchi). Erik Thomson (Steve Rankin). Kim Gyngell (Sergeant Troy Turner). Lisa Blackman (Aunty Rosa). Rob Carlton (Victor Bianchi). Alexander England (Anton Bianchi). Ava Carmont (Young Tasha Hopkins). Kestie Morassi (Tasha Hopkins). Brooke Satchwell (Chloe Walcott). Ziggy Ramo (Ezekiel ‘Zeke’ Lesul). Molly Fatnowna (Young Hazel Baker). Daniela Farinacci (Katherine Bianchi). Lucy Bell (Lynn Rankin). Renee Lim (Senior Sergeant Angie Zhang). Lee Jones (Hector Ford). Oscar Leal (Alejandro). Googoorewon Knox (Young Mick Compton). Isaiah Miller (Kalip Iesul). Anthony J. Sharpe (Billy Hopkins). Joe Kelly (Young Billy Hopkins). Damion Hunter (Mick Compton). ‘Ana Ika (Luni). Andrew Malayta (Niman Lesul). Merleeka Williams (Mary Lesul). Syd Brisbane (Drinker). Simon Morsley (Mr. Ludwik). Jason Quakawoot (Uncle Butch). Nicholas Hope (Tommy Doyle). Patrick Cowan (Boy on Bicycle). Edgar Yasserie (Flats Uncle). Sean Dow (Sketchy Man). Lily Bryans (Chloe’s Secretary). Karmon Power (Singer). Richard Askern (Ritchie). Lachelle Power (Meg)

Language English.

Producers Rosemary Blight. Kylie Du Fresne. Ben Grant. Milly Olrog. Lois Randall. Lucas Taylor. Kaylene Butler.

Production Goalpost Pictures.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status OnGoing (2022–)
